lines.text: I mean, they were doing a ritual, right?
Maybe the <c=#FF6000>Go Wizard</c> was just in a hurry, and knocked over a lit candle!
Back it up, Seeker. Isn't he holding the only candle in the room that's been lit?
...So, he knocked it over, then picked it up, but it was too late.
...Huh. Yeah, kind of weird that it'd be his priority when someone was pointing a gun at him.
I doubt he'd try to complete a complicated sacrifical ritual at gunpoint...
If he was trying to accomplish something there, it probably wasn't an attempt to pull off a ritual they hadn't even started.
